page.title: 13CHANGING TIMES IN BARSBY (2)
page.content: One of the more regretable ways in which Barsby has changed is the increase in road traffic. cars were not catered for when Barsby was built, and now they congest the roads, at times spoil the appearance of the village, and have have even caused the division of the village because of the volume traffic on the main road, nevertheless most residents feel that a car is a necesity. Residents of Barsby are kept informed of all the local news by two local newspapers the Leicester Mercury and the County Mercury also barsby villagers do have some community services such as the womens institute and the mothers union.
